comments.body:
{code}
Error Message

Expected to find 'Failed to load an FSImage file!' but got unexpected exception:java.io.IOException: Failed to load FSImage file, see error(s) above for more info.

HI [~cnauroth] and [~szetszwo],

Would you please take a look at the patch? Thanks.

Thanks Nicholas again for catching the issue.
By the way this is a duplicate of HDFS-9648 :)

Thanks [~liuml07] and [~jojochuang].

I marked it as duplicate of HDFS-9648.
[~yzhangal] I should have commented on HDFS-9569 earlier. Sorry for the duplicated work.
No problem [~jojochuang], thanks for being proactive and working on HDFS-9648.
